description: Letter dated 06/04/2009 from Mike O'Brien MP to Elliot Morley MP regarding the report from the Committee on Radioactive Waste (CoRWM) on interim storage of higher activity wastes and management of spent nuclear fuels, plutonium and uranium, published March 2009. Incl. copy of report. 56 p.
department: Dept of Energy and Climate Change Radioactive Waste Management Committee
